Years of research and testing have gone into Buoy, our best-selling hydrating wellness drops made with people and all their drinks in mind.

settings.title: Peak Performance
settings.text: Losing as little as 2% of key electrolytes and fluids can significantly impair physical and mental performance. When you exercise, you lose 6-10%.
settings.subtext: SHORTER RECOVERIES | RESTORE FLUID + ELECTROLYTE BALANCE

settings.title: Enhanced Productivity
settings.text: At universities in East London and Westminster, students who hydrated while taking an exam improved their scores by 5% over their dried-out classmates.

settings.title: Emotional Wellbeing
settings.text: Even the healthiest people show mood changes when mildly dehydrated. In men, dehydration promotes feelings of anxiety and nervousness; in women, sluggishness and brain fog are more common.

settings.title: Supports Satiety
settings.text: Insufficient micronutrient and mineral levels are triggers for appetite and hunger. Our all-natural, hand-harvested sea salt has 87 micronutrients and trace-minerals.

settings.title: Immune Support
settings.text: Staying hydrated with fluid and electrolytes is the foundation for normal immune function and promotes your body's ability to detox. Our added vitamins and herbal extracts provide a robust antioxidant boost.

settings.title: Feel and move your best
settings.text: Remineralize and deeply hydrate your cells with the drinks you‚Äôre already drinking.

settings.title: Waking Up
settings.text: You wake up dehydrated. Wake up on the right side of the bed by adding a hydration boost to your morning routine.

settings.title: Working Out
settings.text: Losing just 2% of fluids and key electrolytes can impact physical performance. When you exercise, you lose 6-10%.

settings.title: The 2pm Wall
settings.text: That midday wall is classic dehydration. Address the root symptoms with hydration not just another matcha.

settings.title: On the Go
settings.text: When air is fry, like in low-humidity airplane cabins, your throats's cilia is much less effective at fending off viruses and bacteria, making you more vulnerable to getting sick. Fortify your immune system with hydration while in the air.

settings.title: Happy Hour
settings.text: Give your body what it needs to break down acetaldehyde alcohol's toxic byproduct, while you're drinking. Mix us in with the fun to feel better the next day.

settings.title: Bedtime
settings.text: Buoy's all-natural, hand harvested sea salt is a natural deep sleep promoter. Add some into the last thing you drink before bed to catch some quality Zs.

settings.title: Healthy habits made easy
settings.text: We made Buoy to seamlessly fit into your lifestyle. Squeeze throughout the day, everyday.

settings.text: Try Buoy in everything‚Äîeven alcohol!

settings.name: 87 Trace Ionic Minerals
settings.fast_fact: Although sodium gets a bad rap for cardiovascular health, you shouldn‚Äôt avoid it entirely. Your body needs it to function. Instead, focus on choosing better sources of sodium that aren‚Äôt processed or manufactured.
settings.important: Sodium maintains fluid balance through osmosis. Without proper amounts, you‚Äôre either losing more water than you can take in (dehydration), or consuming more water than your body can get rid of (hypervolemia). Both are bad.

settings.title: Is it really flavorless?
settings.answer:
Electrolytes, vitamins, and ionic trace minerals are naturally bitter, which is why traditional sports drinks and hydration supplements use sugar and sweeteners to offset their intense taste.

We spent two years formulating Buoy with not only effective ingredients but also with as neutral of a flavor profile as those essential nutrients can get without adding the junk to mask it. With a proper dosage in a full drink (a light, half-second pinch), you should notice little to no taste. We encourage everyone to try Buoy in their favorite non-water drink to start. Many of our Anti-Yellow Pee Club members like the herbal hint of flavor noticeable in still water.
